item.title: 英伟达本周大有可为，即使盈利还有一个月时间
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）预计还要一个月才会公布财报，但本周这家芯片制造商最大客户的财报将为其股价定下基调。【原文：Nvidia Corp. isn’t expected to announce earnings for another month, but results this week from the chipmaker’s biggest customers are about to set the tone for its shares, which are trading near an all-time high on optimism around the AI boom.】

item.title: 选举失利引发对东京金融中心建设的担忧
item.description: 日本执政联盟令人震惊地失去了多数席位，这让东京的银行家们对新政府振兴金融市场的承诺，包括推动其在资产管理领域的发展感到担忧。【原文：The shock loss of the majority for Japan’s ruling coalition is making bankers in Tokyo worried about the new government’s commitment to revitalizing financial markets including a push to boost its presence in asset management.】

item.title: S&P 500 盈利不佳，新赛季进入高潮
item.description: S&P 500 指数的公司盈利超出预期的比率是近两年来最低的，这一趋势可能预示着美股基准的下跌。【原文：Companies in the S&P 500 are beating earnings estimates at the lowest rate in nearly two years, a trend that could point to declines for the US stocks benchmark.】

item.title: 经济疲软影响炼油业，中石化利润下滑
item.description: 中国最大的炼油企业中石化第三季度利润出现萎缩，中国经济的困境和电气化交通的普及使中石化面临越来越大的压力。【原文：Sinopec’s third-quarter profits contracted as China’s biggest oil refiner increasingly finds itself under pressure from the nation’s economic woes and embrace of electrified transportation.】

item.title: 印度妇女影子银行在印度央行打击借贷之际推迟首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在印度监管机构下令包括小额贷款公司在内的一批影子贷款机构停止发放新贷款后，Arohan 金融服务有限公司将推迟首次公开募股。【原文：Arohan Financial Services Ltd. is delaying an initial public offering after Indian regulators ordered a group of shadow lenders including microfinance firms to stop sanctioning new loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私募基金潮人即将抢夺您最喜爱的应用程序
item.description:
意大利公司 Bending Spoons 正在收购 Evernote 和 WeTransfer 等订阅工具，并准备再投入数十亿美元。【原文：

Italian company Bending Spoons is buying up subscription tools like Evernote and WeTransfer and is ready to spend billions more.

】

item.title: Pemex 首席执行官继承了世界上最低效的石油公司之一
item.description: 与私营部门的同行相比，国有石油公司往往更加臃肿，效率也更低。然而，墨西哥石油公司拥有约 12.8 万名员工，即使在国有石油公司中也是佼佼者。【原文：National oil companies tend to be more bloated and less efficient than their private-sector counterparts. Yet Petroleos Mexicanos, with a workforce of about 128,000, stands out even among its state-owned peers.】

item.title: 欧洲银行将扩大与印度清算公司的业务往来
item.description: 法国和德国的市场监管机构要求其银行在 10 月底的最后期限之后继续与印度的清算所打交道，据熟悉此事的人士称，此前有关监管权力的争论有可能导致交易脱轨。【原文：Market regulators in France and Germany asked their banks to continue dealing with India’s clearing houses beyond an October-end deadline, after a dispute over supervisory powers threatened to derail trading, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 沙特金融公司 2.64 亿美元的首次公开募股在数分钟内被完全覆盖
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯金融服务公司联合国际控股公司（United International Holding Co.【原文：Saudi Arabian financial services firm United International Holding Co. had demand for all shares in its up to 990 million riyal ($264 million) initial public offering minutes after subscriptions opened, indicating continued demand for listings in the region.】

item.title: 泰国经济萎靡不振，商业团体呼吁加大刺激力度
item.description: 泰国主要商业团体和商业银行敦促总理钦那瓦推出新措施，刺激消费者支出，解决亚洲家庭债务水平最高的国家之一的问题。【原文：Thailand’s leading business groups and commercial banks urged Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra to roll out fresh measures to spur consumer spending and tackle one of the highest levels of household debt levels in Asia.】

item.title: 地缘政治担忧缓解，欧洲股市上涨，航空公司反弹
item.description: 欧洲股市上扬，原因是投资者准备迎接又一个繁忙的财报周，而且以色列对伊朗的有限打击缓解了对地缘政治的担忧。【原文：European stocks advanced as investors braced for another busy week of earnings and geopolitical concerns eased after limited Israeli strikes on Iran.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州的房屋保险为何一团糟
item.description:
情况是否有所好转？【原文：

Are things getting better?

】

item.title: 奇怪的地段：佛罗里达州的房屋保险为何一团糟（播客）
item.description: 奇怪的地段：佛罗里达州的房屋保险为何一团糟（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Why Home Insurance in Florida Is a Mess (Podcast)】

item.title: 原油价格下跌，大石油公司必须借钱给投资者
item.description: 疲软的原油价格和炼油利润很可能迫使五家超级大石油公司中的四家借钱为最近一个季度的 150 亿美元股票回购提供资金，从而引发了对派息长期可持续性的怀疑。【原文：Weaker crude prices and refining margins are likely forcing four of the five supermajor oil companies to borrow money to fund $15 billion in share buybacks for the most recent quarter, raising doubts over the payouts’ long-term sustainability.】

item.title: Absa 从英国机构获得 1.5 亿美元贸易融资贷款
item.description: 南非贷款公司 Absa Group Ltd. 与英国发展融资机构达成了 1.5 亿美元的贸易融资协议，以促进非洲大陆小企业的发展。【原文：South African lender Absa Group Ltd. secured a $150 million trade financing facility with the UK’s development finance arm to boost small businesses in the continent.】

item.title: 以色列在伊朗袭击中避开能源目标，欧洲天然气下滑
item.description: 以色列对伊朗石油、核和民用基础设施目标的打击避免了天然气价格的下跌，这表明与中东冲突有关的供应风险目前仍然受到控制。【原文：European natural gas prices declined after Israeli strikes against targets in Iran avoided oil, nuclear and civilian infrastructure, signaling that supply risks linked to the Middle East conflict remain contained for now.】

item.title: 据说布谷鸟将在吉隆坡的首次公开募股中寻求高达 7.5 亿林吉特的资金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，韩国布谷鸟控股公司（Cuckoo Holdings Co.【原文：The Malaysian unit of South Korea’s Cuckoo Holdings Co. could raise as much as 750 million ringgit ($172 million) from a planned initial public offering in Kuala Lumpur next year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：油价下滑将拖累英国股市
Pick n Pay 将在今年非洲最大的首次公开募股中将 Boxer 部门上市
item.description: Pick n Pay Stores Ltd.表示，该公司将于今年年底前在约翰内斯堡证券交易所上市其低成本 Boxer 业务，在此过程中，这家南非杂货商将筹集多达 80 亿兰特（约合 4.52 亿美元）的资金，成为今年非洲大陆最大的上市交易。【原文：Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. said it will list its low-cost Boxer business on the Johannesburg bourse by the end of the year and that the South African grocer will raise as much as 8 billion rand ($452 million) in the process, making it the continent’s biggest offering this year.】

item.title: 越南咖啡产区开始收获时被暴雨浸泡
item.description: 热带风暴 "特拉米 "在越南主要咖啡种植区的部分地区降下暴雨，而此时世界上最大的罗布斯塔咖啡生产国正开始收获咖啡豆。【原文：Tropical Storm Trami has dumped heavy rain across some parts of Vietnam’s key coffee-growing region, just as the world’s biggest producer of robusta starts harvesting beans.】

item.title: 阿曼能源公司首次公开募股 20 亿美元后股价下跌
item.description: 阿曼 OQ Exploration & Production 公司在马斯喀特有史以来最大的首次公开募股中以 20 亿美元上市，上市后首次交易即告下跌。【原文：Oman’s OQ Exploration & Production declined in its trading debut after a $2 billion listing that marked Muscat’s biggest initial public offering on record.】

item.title: 中国需求疲软，飞利浦下调年度销售展望
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司（Royal Philips NV）下调了今年的销售增长预期，原因是中国需求不振对这家荷兰医疗技术公司的订单造成了压力。【原文：Royal Philips NV slashed its sales-growth forecast for the year as tepid demand from China weighs on the Dutch medical technology firm’s orders.】

item.title: 中国钢铁协会誓言推进改革，中国钢铁企业股价大涨
item.description: 在中国主要行业协会表示将提出具体政策，以重塑需求下降和盈利能力低下的钢铁行业后，中国主要钢铁企业股价大涨。【原文：Major Chinese steelmakers surged after the country’s main industry association said it would propose specific policies to reshape the sector in the face of falling demand and poor profitability.】

item.title: 高盛再融资 5 亿澳元澳大利亚房地产信贷基金
item.description: 总部位于悉尼的非银行贷款机构 Pallas Capital 在周一的一份声明中表示，该公司的 5 亿澳元（约合 3.3 亿美元）私人信贷商业地产基金已获得高盛集团的再融资。【原文：Pallas Capital’s A$500 million ($330 million) private credit commercial real estate fund has been refinanced by Goldman Sachs Group Inc., the Sydney-based non-bank lender said in a statement on Monday.】

item.title: 海湾地区顶级杂货商露露在阿布扎比首次公开募股中寻求高达 14.3 亿美元的投资
item.description: 露露零售控股公司（Lulu Retail Holdings Plc）希望通过首次公开募股筹集高达 52.7 亿迪拉姆（约合 14.3 亿美元）的资金，这将是阿拉伯联合酋长国今年最大的一次上市。【原文：Lulu Retail Holdings Plc is looking to raise as much as 5.27 billion dirhams ($1.43 billion) from its initial public offering, in what’s set to be the United Arab Emirates’ biggest listing of the year.】

item.title: 日本的稳定在十月获得了巨大惊喜
item.description:
疲软的领导人石破茂可能难以在自民党通常的舒适区之外形成多数。【原文：

Weakened leader Ishiba may struggle to form a majority outside the LDP’s usual comfort zone.

】

item.title: 梅格-惠特曼在非洲的使命美国技术胜过中国技术
item.description:
作为驻肯尼亚大使，这位前eBay和惠普首席执行官将制衡中国对肯尼亚的影响作为工作重点。【原文：

As ambassador to Kenya, the former eBay and HP CEO has made a priority of counterbalancing Chinese influence on the continent.

】

item.title: 马斯克和他的朋友们正在扼杀互联网上的求真者
item.description:
针对研究虚假信息的群体是民主的坏消息。【原文：

Targeting groups studying disinformation is bad news for democracy. 

】

item.title: 随着降息的推进，欧洲央行的沟通越来越混乱
item.description: 迄今为止，欧洲央行官员在引导欧元区经济向 2% 的通胀率迈进的过程中，基本上都是异口同声。但是，随着他们的目标越来越近，关于何时该做什么的观点也将出现分歧。【原文：So far, European Central Bank officials have mostly succeeded in steering the euro-zone economy toward 2% inflation with a single voice. But as they circle in on their target, views on what to do when are set to diverge.】

item.title: 对冲基金在欧洲红利市场影响力日增
item.description: 对冲基金正日益重塑价值数十亿美元的欧洲红利市场。【原文：Hedge funds are increasingly reshaping the multi-billion dollar market for European dividends.】
